alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Muskogee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 8:14AM CDT until April 13 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR MCINTOSH AND CENTRAL MUSKOGEE COUNTIES... At 814 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Council Hill to 2 miles southeast of Raiford, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Checotah... Oktaha... Council Hill... Rentiesville... Stidham... Raiford... Vivian... Lake Eufaula State Park... Wainwright... Hitchita... Pierce... Onapa... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 250 and 274. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
